name: BLU Realty Group
overview:
BLU Realty Group

As a full service brokerage firm in Manhattan, BLU Realty Group has a true feel for the pulse of New York’s luxury real estate market. By specializing in residential sales in both the Manhattan and international markets, BLU Realty Group has created a massive network of that expands to more than 150 different countries. With their global reach, BLU Realty Group brings world-class intelligence and profound local expertise to every client.

What really makes BLU Realty Group shine is the unrivaled experience of the BLU real estate executive team. They are dedicated to help BLU Realty Group achieve lasting results within in the market. While many of our past accomplishments come directly from the hard work and leadership of our executive team, our future lies in leadership of our management team. We have assembled a team that will lead our company to the future and that have helped BLU Realty Group develop strong core values.

At the heart of everything our management team, our executives, and our pool of talented agents do resounds with our company’s values. We have built BLU Realty Group on a foundation of values such as honesty, integrity and respect, and make certain these values resonate with everything we do. From the sharp negotiation skills and industry expertise of our world-renowned agents to the dedicated promotional services offered by our marketing team, everything BLU Realty Group does is done to deliver results to our clients.
